text: <@U22PKFRU5> I want to use smart content on the MODX Cms, i tried to use the api with the user token including the HubSpot tracking code on the page and calling the API passing the cookie value and the api key but the result is always the same “is-contact: false”

That `is-contact:false” is because they haven’t filled out a form or we have otherwise have a contact assocciated with that cookie. This will be the vast majority of the case as most people who visit a website haven’t filled out a form.  You should be able to test this by filling out an hs form on your site, visiting then checking the logs
<@UFBNA9K9A> Thanks, that should be the problem
Hey all, does the API have any calls that would allow me to create new HubSpot users? I see read-only, but I’m not seeing anything to create.  HELP!
<@UFBNA9K9A> do we have any endpoint, not listed in the documentation for this ?
